response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product holds significant value for us, but given its relevance to your business, we believe it's a perfect fit for you. We're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a great opportunity to maximize the benefits while enjoying a discount compared to our standard pricing. We're confident this investment will pay off in numerous ways for your company. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 12000}
